https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/17dsINs4ndzsqznJ7c3QbNHdiUv.jpg Five childhood friends from a small Montenegrin town have gradually moved away to different corners of the former Yugoslavia, yet they remain in contact, aware that their long-time friendship continues to play a fundamental role in their lives. After the Winter
